data.name: Craft The World - Heart of Evil
data.detailed_description:
The Heart of Evil DLC adds a new type of world to the game with opposing fortresses.

The player arrives on the scene just when the fortress that is being defended by a garrison of NPC dwarves has almost fallen. Most of its defenders have been killed or captured by the forces of the dark fortress for unknown experiments.

DLC details:
  • A new campaign level designed for experienced players;
  • Two fortresses, between which there are continuous skirmishes, raids, and battles;
  • Periodic reinforcements for the defenders of the fortress will help you restore your defenses and turn the tide of this great battle;
  • There are also new monsters, items, structures, and building blocks.

data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
